TFTTutorial_Augment_BackRowAS1.name: Swift Strike
TFTTutorial_Augment_BackRowAS1.description: Combat start: Your champions in the back 2 rows gain 20 Attack Speed.

TFTTutorial_Augment_FrontRowHealth1.name: Bulwark
TFTTutorial_Augment_FrontRowHealth1.description: Combat start: Your champions in the front 2 rows gain 100 Health.

TFTTutorial_Augment_FrontRowMana1.name: Splash Zone
TFTTutorial_Augment_FrontRowMana1.description: Combat start: Your champions in the front 2 rows gain 20 Mana.

TFTTutorial_Augment_WithItemAS2.name: Elite Vanguard
TFTTutorial_Augment_WithItemAS2.description: Your champions holding an item gain 20 Attack Speed.

TFTTutorial_Augment_WithItemHealth2.name: Cybernetic Mass
TFTTutorial_Augment_WithItemHealth2.description: Your champions holding an item gain 300 Health.

TFTTutorial_Augment_WithoutItemAS2.name: Unhindered
TFTTutorial_Augment_WithoutItemAS2.description: Your champions without items gain 55 Attack Speed.

TFT6_Augment_PortableForge.name: Portable Forge
TFT6_Augment_PortableForge.description:
Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

TFT6_Augment_Recombobulator.name: Recombobulator
TFT6_Augment_Recombobulator.description: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher (max 5). Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

TFT7_Augment_LivingForge.name: Living Forge
TFT7_Augment_LivingForge.description:
Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every 10 player combats.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

TFT7_Augment_BirthdayPresents.name: Birthday Present
TFT7_Augment_BirthdayPresents.description: Gain a 2-star champion and 1 gold every time you level up. The champion's cost tier is your level minus 4 (max: 5-cost).

TFT6_Augment_GachaAddict.name: Prismatic Ticket
TFT6_Augment_GachaAddict.description: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 45% chance to gain a free reroll.

TFT9_Augment_YoungAndWildAndFree.name: Young and Wild and Free
TFT9_Augment_YoungAndWildAndFree.description: You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain 5 gold.

TFT9_Augment_PhreakyFriday.name: Phreaky Friday
TFT9_Augment_PhreakyFriday.description:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 5 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats

TFT9_Augment_LongTimeCrafting.name: Latent Forge
TFT9_Augment_LongTimeCrafting.description:
After 8 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

The anvil offers 4 choices. Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

TFT9_Augment_CustomerIsAlwaysRight.name: Component Buffet
TFT9_Augment_CustomerIsAlwaysRight.description:
Whenever you would get a component, gain a component anvil instead. Gain a random component.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

TFT9_Augment_IronAssets.name: Iron Assets
TFT9_Augment_IronAssets.description: Gain a component anvil and 4 gold.

TFT9_Augment_MissedConnections.name: Missed Connections
TFT9_Augment_MissedConnections.description: Gain a copy of each 1-cost champion.

TFT9_Augment_RollTheDice.name: Roll The Dice
TFT9_Augment_RollTheDice.description:
Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

TFT9_Augment_LongDistanceRelationship2.name: Long Distance Pals
TFT9_Augment_LongDistanceRelationship2.description: Combat start: Your 2 units furthest from each other form a bond, sharing 22% of their Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, and Ability Power with each other.

TFT9_Augment_BuildingACollectionPlusPlus.name: Buried Treasures III
TFT9_Augment_BuildingACollectionPlusPlus.description: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 6 rounds (including this round).

TFT6_Augment_PandorasItems.name: Pandora's Items
TFT6_Augment_PandorasItems.description:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 1 random component.

TFT9_Augment_PandorasRadiantBox.name: Pandora's Items III
TFT9_Augment_PandorasRadiantBox.description:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 1 random Radiant item.

TFT9_Augment_PandorasItems2.name: Pandora's Items II
TFT9_Augment_PandorasItems2.description:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 2 random components.

TFT9_Augment_ArmyBuilding.name: Team Building
TFT9_Augment_ArmyBuilding.description:
Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 5 player combats.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

TFT9_Augment_RiskyMoves.name: Risky Moves
TFT9_Augment_RiskyMoves.description: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 player combats, gain 30 gold.

TFT9_Augment_NotToday.name: Not Today
TFT9_Augment_NotToday.description: Gain an Edge of Night. Champions holding this item gain 35% Attack Speed.

TFT6_Augment_OneTwoFive.name: One, Two, Five!
TFT6_Augment_OneTwoFive.description: Gain 1 random component, 2 gold, and 1 random 5-cost champion.

TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp.name: Pumping Up I
TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp.description: Your team gains 6% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 0.5% more. (current Attack Speed: <placeholder>%)

TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp2.name: Pumping Up II
TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp2.description: Your team gains 8% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 1% more. (current Attack Speed: <placeholder>%)

TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp3.name: Pumping Up III
TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp3.description: Your team gains 12% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 2% more. (current Attack Speed: <placeholder>%)

TFT9_Augment_TiniestTitan.name: Tiniest Titan
TFT9_Augment_TiniestTitan.description: Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

TFT6_Augment_TradeSector.name: Trade Sector
TFT6_Augment_TradeSector.description: Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain 4 gold.

TFT6_Augment_MaxLevel10.name: Level Up!
TFT6_Augment_MaxLevel10.description: When you buy XP, gain an additional 2. Gain 12 immediately.

TFT9_Augment_RedBuff.name: Blistering Strikes
TFT9_Augment_RedBuff.description: Your team's attacks Burn their targets for 5% of their max Health over 5 seconds. Attacks also reduce their targets' healing received by 33%.

TFT9_Augment_LearningFromExperience2.name: Patient Study
TFT9_Augment_LearningFromExperience2.description: After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost.

TFT6_Augment_RadiantRelics.name: Radiant Relics
TFT6_Augment_RadiantRelics.description:
Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

TFT7_Augment_LategameSpecialist.name: Lategame Specialist
TFT7_Augment_LategameSpecialist.description: When you reach Level 9, gain 33 gold.

TFT9_Augment_HighEndSector.name: Shopping Spree
TFT9_Augment_HighEndSector.description: When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level+1. Gain 4 gold.

TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook1.name: Caretaker's Ally
TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook1.description:
Gain a random 2-cost champion now. Gain the same one again every time you level up.

Champion:

TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook2.name: Caretaker's Favor
TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook2.description:
Gain a component anvil when you reach level 5, 6, 7, and 8.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook3.name: Caretaker's Chosen
TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook3.description:
As you level, gain more powerful items.
Level 4: component anvil
Level 6: completed item anvil
Level 7: choose 1 of 5 Radiant items

TFT9_Augment_PhreakyFridayPlus.name: Phreaky Friday +
TFT9_Augment_PhreakyFridayPlus.description:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats

TFT10_Augment_InspiringEpitaph.name: Inspiring Epitaph
TFT10_Augment_InspiringEpitaph.description: When a unit dies, the nearest ally gains a 20% max Health Shield and 8% stacking Attack Speed.

TFT10_Augment_HeroicGrabBag.name: Heroic Grab Bag
TFT10_Augment_HeroicGrabBag.description:
Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators. Gain 7 gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

TFT6_Augment_ClearMind.name: Clear Mind
TFT6_Augment_ClearMind.description: If there are no champions on your bench at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.

TFT7_Augment_ClutteredMind.name: Cluttered Mind
TFT7_Augment_ClutteredMind.description: Gain 4 random 1-cost champions now. If your bench is full at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.

TFT10_Augment_GoingLong.name: Going Long
TFT10_Augment_GoingLong.description:
You no longer gain interest. Gain 15 gold now. Round start: gain 4 XP.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

TFT10_Augment_Scapegoat.name: Scapegoat
TFT10_Augment_Scapegoat.description: Gain a Training Dummy and 1 gold. If it is the first to die each player combat, gain 1 gold.

TFT10_Augment_GoodForSomethingSilver.name: Good For Something I
TFT10_Augment_GoodForSomethingSilver.description: Champions that aren't holding items have a 50% chance to drop 1 gold on death.

TFT10_Augment_CrownGuarded.name: Crown Guarded
TFT10_Augment_CrownGuarded.description: Gain a Crownguard. Your Crownguards' start of combat effect is 85% stronger and the shield lasts 5 seconds longer.

TFT7_Augment_LuckyGloves.name: Lucky Gloves
TFT7_Augment_LuckyGloves.description: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves. In 7 rounds, get another Sparring Gloves.

TFT7_Augment_LuckyGlovesPlus.name: Lucky Gloves+
TFT7_Augment_LuckyGlovesPlus.description: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 3 Sparring Gloves.

TFT9_Augment_TiniestTitanPlus.name: Tiniest Titan+
TFT9_Augment_TiniestTitanPlus.description: Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster. Gain 15 gold now.

TFT9_Augment_Commander_TeamingUp2.name: Teaming Up II
TFT9_Augment_Commander_TeamingUp2.description: Gain 1 random Support item and 2 random 4-cost champions.

TFT9_Augment_Commander_TeamingUp1.name: Teaming Up I
TFT9_Augment_Commander_TeamingUp1.description: Gain 1 random component and 2 random Tier 3 champions.

TFT9_Augment_BigGrabBag.name: Big Grab Bag
TFT9_Augment_BigGrabBag.description:
Gain 3 random components, 2 gold, and 1 Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

TFT9_Augment_WanderingTrainer.name: Wandering Trainer II
TFT9_Augment_WanderingTrainer.description: Gain a Training Dummy with 3 permanently attached Emblems. Gain 6 gold.

TFT11_Augment_WanderingTrainerGold.name: Wandering Trainer I
TFT11_Augment_WanderingTrainerGold.description: Gain a Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Emblems. Gain 1 gold.

TFT11_Augment_RainingGold.name: Raining Gold
TFT11_Augment_RainingGold.description: Gain 8 gold now and 1 gold every round.

TFT11_Augment_RainingGoldPlus.name: Raining Gold+
TFT11_Augment_RainingGoldPlus.description: Gain 18 gold now and 1 gold every round.

TFT_Augment_ClockworkAccelerator.name: Clockwork Accelerator
TFT_Augment_ClockworkAccelerator.description: Your team gains 10% Attack Speed every 3 seconds in combat.

TFT_Augment_RanduinsImmovableObject.name: Immovable Object
TFT_Augment_RanduinsImmovableObject.description: Gain a Randuin's Omen. Its range is increased by 1 hex and its effect is increased by 33%.

TFT_Augment_WorthTheWaitPrismatic.name: Worth the Wait II
TFT_Augment_WorthTheWaitPrismatic.description:
Gain a random 2-cost champion. Gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

Champion:

TFT_Augment_WorthTheWaitGold.name: Worth the Wait
TFT_Augment_WorthTheWaitGold.description:
Gain a random two-star 1-cost champion. After 2 rounds, gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

Champion:

TFT11_Augment_RadiantRefactor.name: Radiant Refactor
TFT11_Augment_RadiantRefactor.description:
Gain a Masterwork Upgrade and 1 component anvil.

Masterwork Upgrade upgrades an item to Radiant!

TFT11_Augment_Prizefighter.name: Prizefighter
TFT11_Augment_Prizefighter.description: Gain 2 item components. Every 5 wins gives you an item component.

TFT11_Augment_Calltochaos.name: Call to Chaos
TFT11_Augment_Calltochaos.description:
Gain a powerful and random reward.

Reward:

TFT11_Augment_Slammin.name: Slammin'
TFT11_Augment_Slammin.description: Gain 1 random Component(s). After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain 2 XP.

TFT11_Augment_Slammin_Plus.name: Slammin'+
TFT11_Augment_Slammin_Plus.description: Gain 1 random component(s) and 10 XP now. After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain 2 XP.

TFT11_Augment_ScoreboardScrapper.description: Every round, if you're in the bottom 4, your team permanently gains 1.5% Attack Damage and Ability Power. If you're in the top 4, they have 10% more Health.

TFT11_Augment_BloodBank.name: Lunch Money
TFT11_Augment_BloodBank.description:
Every 8 damage you deal to enemy tacticians gives you 2 gold.
Total Payouts: Gold

TFT11_Augment_OverEncumbered.name: Over Encumbered
TFT11_Augment_OverEncumbered.description: For the next stage, you only get 2 bench slots. After, get 2 item components.

TFT11_Augment_Epoch.name: Epoch
TFT11_Augment_Epoch.description: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 4 XP and 2 free rerolls.

TFT11_Augment_EpochPlus.name: Epoch+
TFT11_Augment_EpochPlus.description: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 8 XP and 3 free rerolls.

TFT11_Augment_Reinfourcement.name: ReinFOURcement
TFT11_Augment_Reinfourcement.description: The next 4-cost champion you buy is instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 12 gold.

TFT11_Augment_Buildabud.name: Build a Bud!
TFT11_Augment_Buildabud.description: Gain a random 3-star 1-cost champion. Gain 8 gold.

TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar.name: Spoils of War I
TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar.description: Enemies have a 25% chance to drop loot when killed.

TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar2.name: Spoils of War II
TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar2.description: Enemies have a 30% chance to drop loot when killed.

TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar3.name: Spoils of War III
TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar3.description: Enemies have a 45% chance to drop loot when killed.

TFT_Augment_CalledShot.name: Called Shot
TFT_Augment_CalledShot.description: Set your win streak to +4. Gain 4 gold.

TFT_Augment_CategoryFive.name: Category Five
TFT_Augment_CategoryFive.description: Gain a Runaan's Hurricane. Your Runaan's Hurricanes shoot 1 extra bolts, each dealing 75% of the original damage.

TFT9_Augment_AllThatShimmers.name: All That Shimmers
TFT9_Augment_AllThatShimmers.description: Choose a gold-generating Artifact items and gain a Magnetic Remover.

TFT_Augment_Flexible.name: Flexible
TFT_Augment_Flexible.description: Gain 1 random emblem. At the start of every Stage, gain a random emblem. Your team gains 20 Health for each emblem they are holding.

TFT_Augment_AllThatShimmersPlus.name: All That Shimmers+
TFT_Augment_AllThatShimmersPlus.description: Choose a gold-generating Artifact. Gain a Magnetic Remover and 4 gold.

TFT_Augment_SubscriptionService.description: Now, and at the start of each Stage, open a Shop of 4 unique 4-cost champions and gain 6 gold.

TFT_Augment_RestartMission.name: Restart Mission
TFT_Augment_RestartMission.description: Remove all champions on your board and bench. Gain 2 random 2-star 3-costs,  3 2-star 2-costs, and 1 2-star 1-cost champion.

TFT_Augment_ThornPlatedArmor.name: Thorn-Plated Armor
TFT_Augment_ThornPlatedArmor.description: Gain a Bramble Vest. Your Bramble Vests deal 1-180% more damage (based on Stage) and heal the holder for 35% of the damage dealt.

TFT_Augment_Placebo.name: Placebo
TFT_Augment_Placebo.description: Your team gains 1% Attack Speed. Gain 8 gold.

TFT_Augment_UpwardMobility.name: Upward Mobility
TFT_Augment_UpwardMobility.description: Buying XP costs 1 less. Gain 2 Health and 2 free rerolls whenever you level up.

TFT_Augment_PatienceIsAVirtue.name: Patience is a Virtue
TFT_Augment_PatienceIsAVirtue.description: Each round, gain 2 free rerolls if you did not buy a champion last round.

TFT_Augment_DualPurpose.name: Dual Purpose
TFT_Augment_DualPurpose.description: The first time you buy XP each round, gain 2 gold. Whenever you buy XP, reroll your Shop.

TFT_Augment_ShimmerscaleEssence.name: Shimmerscale Essence
TFT_Augment_ShimmerscaleEssence.description:
Gain a Mogul's Mail. In 5 rounds, gain a Gamblers Blade.

These items give gold as well as combat power.

TFT_Augment_HighVoltage.name: High Voltage
TFT_Augment_HighVoltage.description: Gain an Ionic Spark. Your Ionic Sparks have +3 hex radius and do 25% more damage.

TFT_Augment_Pilfer.name: Pilfer
TFT_Augment_Pilfer.description: Each round, gain a 1-star copy of the first champion you killed last combat.

TFT_Augment_HardCommit.name: Hard Commit
TFT_Augment_HardCommit.description: Gain a random emblem. Now and at the start of each stage, gain a 1-star champion of that trait with a cost equal to the Stage (max 5).

TFT_Augment_InvestedPlus.name: Invested+
TFT_Augment_InvestedPlus.description: Gain 26 gold. At the start of each round, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

TFT_Augment_InvestedPlusPlus.name: Invested++
TFT_Augment_InvestedPlusPlus.description: Gain 45 gold. At the start of each round, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

TFT_Augment_Mentorship1.name: Mentorship I

TFT_Augment_Mentorship2.name: Mentorship II
TFT_Augment_Mentorship2.description: If an ally starts combat next to a higher-cost ally, it gains 16% Attack Speed and 220 Health.

TFT_Augment_ItemCollector1.name: Item Collector I
TFT_Augment_ItemCollector1.description: For each unique item they are holding, your team gains 1 Attack Damage and 1 Ability Power.

TFT_Augment_ItemCollector2.name: Item Collector II
TFT_Augment_ItemCollector2.description: Your team gains 20 Health. For each unique item they are holding, your team gains bonus 5 Health, 1.5 Attack Damage, and 1.5 Ability Power.

TFT_Augment_Replication.name: Replication
TFT_Augment_Replication.description: Choose 1 of 3 components. For the next 2 rounds, gain a copy of that component.

TFT_Augment_TraitTracker.name: Trait Tracker
TFT_Augment_TraitTracker.description: The first time you activate 8 non-unique traits for 1 combat, gain 6 random emblems.

TFT_Augment_OopsAllRageblades.name: Anger Issues
TFT_Augment_OopsAllRageblades.description: All your current and future completed items transform into Guinsoo's Rageblades that grant 45 Armor and Magic Resist. Every 2 Rageblade stacks grant 1% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

TFT_Augment_PlaceboPlus.name: Placebo+
TFT_Augment_PlaceboPlus.description: Your team gains 1% Attack Speed. Gain 15 gold.

TFT_Augment_DuoQueue.name: Duo Queue
TFT_Augment_DuoQueue.description: Gain 2 random 5-cost champions and 2 copies of a random component.

TFT_Augment_FindYourCenter.name: Find Your Center
TFT_Augment_FindYourCenter.description: Your champion that starts combat in the center of the front row gains 15% Damage Amp and 15% max Health.

TFT_Augment_ImTheCarryNow.name: I'm the Carry Now
TFT_Augment_ImTheCarryNow.description: Get a Golem with tailored offensive items. It gets stronger at the start of each Stage.

TFT7_Augment_PandorasBench.name: Pandora's Bench
TFT7_Augment_PandorasBench.description: At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost. Gain 2 gold.

TFT9_Augment_HedgeFund.name: Hedge Fund
TFT9_Augment_HedgeFund.description:
Gain 25 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

TFT_Augment_Dummify.name: Dummify
TFT_Augment_Dummify.description: Lose all champions on your board and bench. Gain a Training Dummy with 80% of their combined health. The dummy gains 1000 Health per stage.

TFT_Augment_HeadStart.name: Delayed Start
TFT_Augment_HeadStart.description: Sell your board and bench. Gain 4 random 2-star 1 cost champions. Disable your Shop for the next 3 rounds.

TFT_Augment_BulkyBuddies1.name: Bulky Buddies I
TFT_Augment_BulkyBuddies1.description: Allies that start combat next to exactly 1 other ally gain 100 Health. When that champion dies, the other gains a 10% max Health Shield for 10 seconds.

TFT_Augment_Survivor.name: Survivor
TFT_Augment_Survivor.description: After 3 players are eliminated, gain 92 gold.

TFT_Augment_BulkyBuddies2.name: Bulky Buddies II
TFT_Augment_BulkyBuddies2.description: Allies that start combat next to exactly 1 other ally gain 175 Health. When that champion dies, the other gains a 15% max Health Shield for 10 seconds.

TFT_Augment_TacticiansKitchen.name: Tactician's Kitchen
TFT_Augment_TacticiansKitchen.description: Gain a random Emblem. After 6 player combats, gain a Tactician's Cape.

TFT_Augment_BulkyBuddies3.name: Bulky Buddies III
TFT_Augment_BulkyBuddies3.description: Allies that start combat next to exactly 1 other ally gain 330 Health. When that champion dies, the other gains a 18% max Health Shield for 10 seconds.

TFT_Augment_CraftedCrafting.name: Crafted Crafting
TFT_Augment_CraftedCrafting.description: Whenever you craft a completed item, gain 2 rerolls.

TFT_Augment_MirroredMonetization.name: Malicious Monetization
TFT_Augment_MirroredMonetization.description: Gain 2 gold. For the next 3 rounds, enemy champions drop 2 gold when killed.

TFT_Augment_Coronation.name: Coronation
TFT_Augment_Coronation.description: Gain a Tactician's Crown. Tactician's Crown, Shield, and Cape grant the holder an additional 25% Attack Speed, 25% Attack Damage, and 35 Ability Power.

TFT_Augment_OneBuffTwoBuff.name: One Buff, Two Buff
TFT_Augment_OneBuffTwoBuff.description: Gain a Red Buff, a Blue Buff, and a Champion Duplicator.

TFT_Augment_Moonlight.name: Moonlight
TFT_Augment_Moonlight.description: Combat start: 1 random 1-cost champion is upgraded to 3-star for that round and gains 45% Attack Damage and 45 Ability Power.

TFT_Augment_BronzeForLifeI.name: Bronze For Life I
TFT_Augment_BronzeForLifeI.description:
Your team gains 3% Damage Amp for each Bronze-tier trait.

Damage Amp Bonus: %

TFT_Augment_GreaterMoonlight.name: Greater Moonlight
TFT_Augment_GreaterMoonlight.description: Combat Start: 1 random 1-cost champion is upgraded to 4-star for that round and gains 5% Attack Damage and 5 Ability Power.

TFT_Augment_BronzeForLife2.name: Bronze For Life II
TFT_Augment_BronzeForLife2.description:
Your team gains 3.5% Damage Amp and 1% Durability for each Bronze-tier trait.

Damage Amp Bonus: %
Durability Bonus: %

TFT_Augment_TwoTrick.name: Two Trick
TFT_Augment_TwoTrick.description: Gain a random 2-star two-cost and 2 random 2-star one-cost champions.

TFT_Augment_Trifecta1.name: Trifecta I
TFT_Augment_Trifecta1.description: Gain 2 3-cost champions. Combat Start: 3 random 3-cost champions gain 220 Health and 20% Attack Speed.

TFT_Augment_Trifecta2.name: Trifecta II
TFT_Augment_Trifecta2.description: Gain 3 3-cost champions. Allies gain 5% Attack Speed. Combat Start: 3 random 3-cost champions gain 300 Health and 25% Attack Speed.

TFT_Augment_Dhampyr.name: Vampiric Vitality
TFT_Augment_Dhampyr.description: You heal for 20% of the damage you deal to enemy Tacticians. Your units gain 12% Omnivamp.

TFT_Augment_DiversifiedPortfolio1.name: Diversified Portfolio
TFT_Augment_DiversifiedPortfolio1.description:
Gain 1 gold. Each round, gain 1 gold for every 3 non-unique traits active.

Gold Bonus:

TFT_Augment_DiversifiedPortfolio2.name: Diversified Portfolio+
TFT_Augment_DiversifiedPortfolio2.description:
Gain 4 gold. Each round, gain 1 gold for every 3 non-unique traits active.

Gold Bonus:

TFT_Augment_Pyromaniac.name: Pyromaniac
TFT_Augment_Pyromaniac.description: Gain a Red Buff. Your Burns deal 50% increased damage.

TFT_Augment_ShopGlitch.name: Shop Glitch
TFT_Augment_ShopGlitch.description: During non-player combat rounds, your shop refreshes for free every 2.5 seconds for 28 seconds.

TFT_Augment_Golemify.name: Golemify
TFT_Augment_Golemify.description: Lose all champions on your board and bench. Gain a Golem with 70% of their combined Health and 60% of their combined Attack Damage. The Golem gains 1000 Health per stage.

TFT_Augment_WealthyRehab1.name: Health is Wealth I
TFT_Augment_WealthyRehab1.description:
Your team gains 10% Omnivamp. Get a bonus of 8 gold when your team first accumulates 10000 total champion healing.

Total Healing:

TFT_Augment_WealthyRehab2.name: Health is Wealth II
TFT_Augment_WealthyRehab2.description:
Your team gains 15% Omnivamp. Get a bonus of 15 gold when your team first accumulates 10000 total champion healing.

Total Healing:

TFT_Augment_Lineup.name: Lineup
TFT_Augment_Lineup.description: Your team gains 2 Armor and Magic Resist for each unit that starts combat in the front two rows.

TFT_Augment_FinalPolish.name: Final Polish
TFT_Augment_FinalPolish.description: Gain a Support Anvil and a completed item anvil.

TFT_Augment_Backup.name: Backup
TFT_Augment_Backup.description: Your team gains 12% Attack Speed if at least 4 allies start combat in the back two rows.

TFT_Augment_BRB.name: BRB
TFT_Augment_BRB.description: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 2 completed item anvils.

TFT_Augment_Voidborne.name: Void Swarm
TFT_Augment_Voidborne.description: Gain a Zz'Rot Portal and another after every 10 player combats. Zz'Rot Portal Voidlings gain 30% Attack Speed and 30% Omnivamp.

TFT_Augment_PrismaticPipeline.name: Prismatic Pipeline
TFT_Augment_PrismaticPipeline.description: The next non-player combat round will drop an additional Prismatic Orb full of amazing loot.

TFT_Augment_PiercingLotus1.name: Piercing Lotus I
TFT_Augment_PiercingLotus1.description: Your team gains 5% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike. Critical strikes 20% Shred and Sunder the target for 3 seconds.

TFT_Augment_PiercingLotus2.name: Piercing Lotus II
TFT_Augment_PiercingLotus2.description: Your team gains 20% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike. Critical strikes 20% Shred and Sunder the target for 3 seconds.

TFT_Augment_QualityOverQuantity.name: Quality Over Quantity
TFT_Augment_QualityOverQuantity.description:
Units holding exactly 1 item upgrade that item to Radiant. Units holding Radiant items gain 4% Health. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

Thief's Gloves counts as multiple items.

TFT_Augment_BeltOverflow.name: Belt Overflow
TFT_Augment_BeltOverflow.description: Gain 5 Giant's Belts. Your Giant's Belts grant +60 bonus Health.

TFT_Augment_NoScoutNoPivot.name: NO SCOUT NO PIVOT
TFT_Augment_NoScoutNoPivot.description: Units can no longer be benched or sold after fighting in a player combat. After each player combat, units that fought gain 12 Health, 1.5% Attack Damage, and 1.5% Ability Power.

TFT_Augment_WandOverflow.name: Wand Overflow
TFT_Augment_WandOverflow.description: Gain 5 Needlessly Large Rods. Your Needlessly Large Rods grant +5% Attack Speed.

TFT_Augment_SwordOverflow.name: Sword Overflow
TFT_Augment_SwordOverflow.description: Gain 5 BF Swords. Your BF Swords grant +2% Attack Speed.

TFT9_Augment_BlindingSpeed.name: Blinding Speed
TFT9_Augment_BlindingSpeed.description:
Gain a Giant Slayer, Guinsoo's Rageblade, a Recurve Bow and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Attack Carries!

TFT_Augment_TableScraps.name: Table Scraps
TFT_Augment_TableScraps.description: After the next 2 carousels, gain one unit that was not taken and its item. Gain 1 gold.

TFT_Augment_Sponging.name: Sponging
TFT_Augment_Sponging.description: Combat start: Up to 6 champions with 1 or fewer items gain a copy of a random completed item from the nearest itemized ally.

TFT_Augment_Scavenger.name: Scavenger
TFT_Augment_Scavenger.description: The first 5 enemy champions that are killed each combat grant a champion on your team a temporary completed item.

TFT_Augment_BadLuckProtection.name: Bad Luck Protection
TFT_Augment_BadLuckProtection.description: Your team can no longer critically strike. Convert each 5% Critical Strike Chance into 5% Attack Damage. Gain a Sparring Gloves.

TFT_Augment_TowerDefense.name: Tower Defense
TFT_Augment_TowerDefense.description: Gain a Training Dummy equipped with a random emblem that fires ranged attacks at enemies. It upgrades as the game goes on.

TFT_Augment_Kingslayer.name: Kingslayer
TFT_Augment_Kingslayer.description: After winning player combat, gain 1 gold. If they had more health than you, gain 6 Gold instead. Gain 1 gold.

TFT_Augment_MaxCap.name: Max Cap
TFT_Augment_MaxCap.description: Your max level is 7. Gain 1 Tactician's Shield which increases your team size by +1, and 40 gold.

TFT_Augment_CrownguardSpirit.name: Crown's Will
TFT_Augment_CrownguardSpirit.description: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain 10 Ability Power and 10 Armor.

TFT_Augment_FlurryOfBlows.name: Flurry of Blows
TFT_Augment_FlurryOfBlows.description: Gain a Zeke's Herald. Champions buffed by Zeke's also gain 45% Critical Strike Chance.

TFT_Augment_ShojinSpirit.name: Spear's Will
TFT_Augment_ShojinSpirit.description: Your team gains 10% Attack Damage and 10 Mana. Gain a B.F. Sword.

TFT_Augment_MagicRoll.name: A Magic Roll
TFT_Augment_MagicRoll.description:
Roll 3 dice. Gain rewards based on their total.

Reward:

TFT_Augment_GuardbreakerSpirit.name: Mace's Will
TFT_Augment_GuardbreakerSpirit.description: Gain a Sparring Gloves. Your team gains 6% Attack Speed and 20% Critical Strike Chance.

TFT_Augment_Manaflow1.name: Manaflow I
TFT_Augment_Manaflow1.description: Your units that start combat in the back row gain 2 additional Mana per attack.

TFT_Augment_Manaflow2.name: Manaflow II
TFT_Augment_Manaflow2.description: Your units that start combat in the back row gain 3 additional Mana per attack.

TFT_Augment_TombRaider1.name: Tomb Raider I
TFT_Augment_TombRaider1.description: For the next 3 players eliminated, choose one of their completed items to keep.

TFT_Augment_TwoMuchValue.name: Two Much Value
TFT_Augment_TwoMuchValue.description: Gain 1 reroll for every 2 unique two-cost champions fielded last combat. Gain 2 two-cost unit.

TFT_Augment_AnExaltedAdventure.name: An Exalted Adventure
TFT_Augment_AnExaltedAdventure.description:
Gain three 2-cost champions. If you 3-star two of them, gain an orb filled with loot. Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator at the start of next 2 stages.

Champions: , ,

TFT_Augment_ExpectedUnexpectedness.name: Expected Unexpectedness
TFT_Augment_ExpectedUnexpectedness.description: Now and at the start of the next 2 stages, roll 3 dice. Gain various rewards based on their total.

TFT_Augment_CalculatedEnhancement.name: Calculated Enhancement
TFT_Augment_CalculatedEnhancement.description: Each combat, 4 random champions in your last two rows gain 40% Attack Damage and 50 Ability Power.

TFT_Augment_StarryNight.name: Starry Night
TFT_Augment_StarryNight.description:
1-cost and 2-cost units in your shop have a chance to be 2-star. Gain 6 gold.

Current Chances: %
Chances increase with player level.

TFT_Augment_RiggedShopPlus.name: Rigged Shop+
TFT_Augment_RiggedShopPlus.description: Your next shop and every 4 shops will contain all 3-cost champions. Gain 9 rerolls.

TFT_Augment_PairOfFours.name: Pair of Fours
TFT_Augment_PairOfFours.description: If your team has exactly 2 four-cost champions, they each gain 404 Health and 24.4% Attack Speed. Gain a random 4-cost.

TFT_Augment_AllForOneI.name: One For All I
TFT_Augment_AllForOneI.description: Your team gains 2% max Health and 1% Damage Amp for each unique one-cost champion on your board. Gain 2 one-costs.

TFT_Augment_AllForOneII.name: One For All II
TFT_Augment_AllForOneII.description: Your team gains 3% max Health and 1.5% Damage Amp for each unique one-cost champion on your board. Gain 3 one-costs.

TFT_Augment_GoldForDummies.name: Gold For Dummies
TFT_Augment_GoldForDummies.description: Gain a Training Dummy. Every 10 seconds, all Training Dummies grant 1 gold.

TFT_Augment_HallOfMirrors.name: Hall of Mirrors
TFT_Augment_HallOfMirrors.description: Combat start: All champions in your front row become clones of the champion in the center of the row. Clones have 115% of their original health, and deal 5% less damage.

TFT_Augment_BlazingSoul.name: Blazing Soul I
TFT_Augment_BlazingSoul.description: Combat start: Your highest Attack Speed champion gains 20 Ability Power and 20% Attack Speed. Repeat on another ally every 3 seconds.

TFT_Augment_BlazingSoul2.name: Blazing Soul II
TFT_Augment_BlazingSoul2.description: Combat start: Your highest Attack Speed champion gains 35 Ability Power and 35% Attack Speed. Repeat on another ally every 3 seconds.

TFT_Augment_SupportMining.name: Support Mining
TFT_Augment_SupportMining.description: Gain a Training Dummy. When it dies 8 times, gain a random Support Item and remove the Training Dummy.

TFT_Augment_SupportMiningPlus.name: Support Mining+
TFT_Augment_SupportMiningPlus.description: Gain a Training Dummy. When it dies 7 times, gain a random Support Item and remove the Training Dummy.

TFT_Augment_Corrosion.name: Corrosion
TFT_Augment_Corrosion.description: Enemy champions in the first two rows lose 3 Armor and Magic Resist every 2 seconds.

TFT_Augment_SatedSpellweaver.name: Sated Spellweaver
TFT_Augment_SatedSpellweaver.description: After casting an Ability, champions gain 20% Omnivamp for 3 seconds. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 300 Health.

TFT_Augment_FiresalePlus.name: Firesale
TFT_Augment_FiresalePlus.description: Each round, steal a random 3-cost or lower champion from the shop. Gain 1 gold.

TFT_Augment_TitanicTitan.name: Titanic Titan
TFT_Augment_TitanicTitan.description: Increase your current and max player health by 25. On carousel rounds you are released earlier, but are much slower.

TFT_Augment_ForwardThinking.name: Forward Thinking
TFT_Augment_ForwardThinking.description:
Lose all your gold. After 5 player combats, gain back the original amount and another 70 gold.

Incoming Gold:

TFT_Augment_InvestmentStrategy1.name: Investment Strategy I
TFT_Augment_InvestmentStrategy1.description: Your champions gain 7 permanent max health per interest you earn.

TFT_Augment_GlassCannonI.name: Glass Cannon I
TFT_Augment_GlassCannonI.description: Units that start combat in the back row begin combat at 90% health but gain 15% Damage Amp.

TFT_Augment_InvestmentStrategy2.name: Investment Strategy II
TFT_Augment_InvestmentStrategy2.description: Your champions gain 8 permanent max health per interest you earn. Your max interest is increased to 7. Gain 3 gold.

TFT_Augment_GlassCannonII.name: Glass Cannon II
TFT_Augment_GlassCannonII.description: Units that start combat in the back row begin combat at 90% health but gain 18% Damage Amp.

TFT_Augment_Overheal.name: Overheal
TFT_Augment_Overheal.description: Every third attack deals an additional 130% damage and heals 50% of the damage. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 300 Health.

TFT_Augment_Warpath.name: Warpath
TFT_Augment_Warpath.description:
Gain a 2-star 2-cost champion. After dealing 80 player damage, gain a chest of high cost champions and items.
(Current: )

TFT_Augment_EyeForAnEye.name: Eye For An Eye
TFT_Augment_EyeForAnEye.description:
For every 15 ally champions that die, gain a random component (max 4).

Deaths Remaining:

TFT_Augment_EyeForAnEyePlus.name: Eye For An Eye+
TFT_Augment_EyeForAnEyePlus.description:
Gain a random component. For every 16 ally champions that die, gain another component (max 3).

Deaths Remaining:

TFT_Augment_ClimbTheLadder1.name: Climb The Ladder I
TFT_Augment_ClimbTheLadder1.description: Each time an ally dies, allies that share at least one trait with them gain 3 Ability Power, 3% Attack Damage, 3 Armor, and 3 Magic Resist.

TFT_Augment_NobleSacrifice.name: Noble Sacrifice
TFT_Augment_NobleSacrifice.description: When your first ally dies each combat, grant your team 25 + 10% of that ally's Armor and Magic Resistance.

TFT_Augment_CloningFacility.name: Cloning Facility
TFT_Augment_CloningFacility.description: Empower the hex in the center of the third row. Summon a clone of the champion in it with 80% base Health and 10% increased Mana cost.

TFT_Augment_ClimbTheLadder2.name: Climb The Ladder II
TFT_Augment_ClimbTheLadder2.description: Each time an ally dies, allies that share at least one trait with them gain 6 Ability Power, 6% Attack Damage, 6 Armor, and 6 Magic Resist.

TFT_Augment_TombRaider2.name: Tomb Raider II
TFT_Augment_TombRaider2.description: Gain 1 completed item Anvil. Every time a player is eliminated, choose one of their completed items to keep.

TFT_Augment_SpiritLink1.name: Spirit Link
TFT_Augment_SpiritLink1.description: Your team restores 6% of their max Health every 4 seconds. Increase the healing by 0.5% for every 10 missing player Health.

TFT_Augment_VoidborneHR.name: Void Swarm
TFT_Augment_VoidborneHR.description: Gain a Zz'Rot Portal and another after every 6 player combats. Zz'Rot Portal Voidlings gain 40% Attack Speed and 25% Omnivamp.

TFT_Augment_StarryNightPlus.name: Starry Night+
TFT_Augment_StarryNightPlus.description:
1-cost and 2-cost units in your shop have a chance to be 2-star. Gain 8 gold.

Current Chances: %
Chances increase with player level.

TFT6_Augment_SalvageBin.name: Salvage Bin
TFT6_Augment_SalvageBin.description: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 7 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

TFT8_Augment_SalvageBinPlus.name: Salvage Bin+
TFT8_Augment_SalvageBinPlus.description: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

TFT6_Augment_SalvageBinHR.name: Salvage Bin
TFT6_Augment_SalvageBinHR.description: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 3 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

TFT6_Augment_CyberneticImplants2.name: Cybernetic Implants II
TFT6_Augment_CyberneticImplants2.description: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and 20% Attack Damage.

TFT6_Augment_CyberneticImplants3.name: Cybernetic Implants III
TFT6_Augment_CyberneticImplants3.description: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and 30% Attack Damage.

TFT_Augment_BranchingOutPlus.name: Branching Out+
TFT_Augment_BranchingOutPlus.description:
Gain a random Emblem and a Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

TFT_Augment_HeroicGrabBagPlus.name: Heroic Grab Bag+
TFT_Augment_HeroicGrabBagPlus.description:
Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators. Gain 9 gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

TFT_Augment_HeroicGrabBagPlusPlus.name: Heroic Grab Bag++
TFT_Augment_HeroicGrabBagPlusPlus.description:
Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators. Gain 13 gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

TFT_Augment_CookingPot.name: Cooking Pot
TFT_Augment_CookingPot.description: At the start of each turn, all units holding a Frying Pan or Spatula item grant the nearest champion 40 permanent Health. Gain a Frying Pan.

TFT6_Augment_Diversify1.name: Stand United I
TFT6_Augment_Diversify1.description: Your units gain 1.5% Attack Damage and 1.5 Ability Power for each non-unique Trait active across your team.

TFT7_Augment_Preparation2.name: Preparation II
TFT7_Augment_Preparation2.description: Champions on your bench permanently gain 35 Health, 3% Attack Damage, and 3 Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

TFT7_Augment_Preparation.name: Preparation I
TFT7_Augment_Preparation.description: Champions on your bench permanently gain 20 Health, 2% Attack Damage, and 2 Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

TFT7_Augment_AFK.name: AFK
TFT7_Augment_AFK.description: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 20 gold.

TFT7_Augment_BigFriend.name: Big Friend I
TFT7_Augment_BigFriend.description: Your units that start combat next to an ally with over 1750 Health take 7% less damage for the rest of combat.

TFT7_Augment_BigFriend2.name: Big Friend II
TFT7_Augment_BigFriend2.description: Your units that start combat next to an ally with over 1750 Health take 10% less damage for the rest of combat.

TFT7_Augment_LastStand.name: Last Stand
TFT7_Augment_LastStand.description: The first time you would be eliminated, you escape death and your team permanently gains 200 Health, 10 Armor and Magic Resist, and 10% Omnivamp.

TFT6_Augment_CyberneticUplink3.name: Cybernetic Uplink III
TFT6_Augment_CyberneticUplink3.description: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and restore 3.5 Mana per second.

TFT6_Augment_CyberneticUplink2.name: Cybernetic Uplink II
TFT6_Augment_CyberneticUplink2.description: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and restore 2.5 Mana per second.

TFT9_Augment_CyberneticBulk3.name: Cybernetic Bulk III
TFT9_Augment_CyberneticBulk3.description: Your champions holding an item gain 500 Health.

TFT9_Augment_CyberneticBulk2.name: Cybernetic Bulk II
TFT9_Augment_CyberneticBulk2.description: Your champions holding an item gain 300 health.

TFT6_Augment_HyperRoll.name: Hustler
TFT6_Augment_HyperRoll.description:
You earn no interest, but gain 3 gold at the start of every player combat round. Gain 3 gold now.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

TFT6_Augment_CalculatedLoss.name: Calculated Loss
TFT6_Augment_CalculatedLoss.description: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold and a free Shop reroll.

TFT9_Augment_Commander_Ascension.name: Ascension
TFT9_Augment_Commander_Ascension.description: After 15 seconds of combat, your units gain 60% Damage Amp.

TFT9_Augment_Commander_FinalAscension.name: Final Ascension
TFT9_Augment_Commander_FinalAscension.description: Your team gains 15% Damage Amp. After 15 seconds, this increases to 50% Damage Amp.

TFT9_Augment_HealingOrbsI.name: Healing Orbs I
TFT9_Augment_HealingOrbsI.description: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 200.

TFT9_Augment_HealingOrbsII.name: Healing Orbs II
TFT9_Augment_HealingOrbsII.description: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 400.

TFT14_Augment_Armorclad_Splash.name: Transistor
TFT14_Augment_Armorclad_Splash.description: When Bastions' start of combat bonus ends, 50% of it converts into Attack Damage and Ability Power and they gain 25% Attack Speed. Gain an Illaoi and Jax.

TFT14_Augment_Bruiser_Vertical.name: Reinforcing Skeleture
TFT14_Augment_Bruiser_Vertical.description:
Whenever a Bruiser dies, it permanently gains 40 Health.
Gain a Darius and Alistar.

TFT14_Augment_Controller_Vertical.name: 10,000 IQ
TFT14_Augment_Controller_Vertical.description: Every 5 rounds with Strategist active, bet whether you'll win more or lose more. If you're correct, gain 2 gold and a random completed item. Gain a LeBlanc and an Ekko.

TFT14_Augment_Cutter_Splash.name: Cutpurse
TFT14_Augment_Cutter_Splash.description:
Executioners have a 4% chance to drop a gold when their attacks critically strike. Gain a Graves and Rengar.

Gold Gained:

TFT14_Augment_Immortal_Vertical.name: Golden Fleece
TFT14_Augment_Immortal_Vertical.description: Each Golden Ox drops 1 gold after fighting 2 rounds. Your max interest is 7. Gain a Graves, an Alistar, and 1 gold.

TFT14_Augment_Marksman_Vertical.name: Flatline
TFT14_Augment_Marksman_Vertical.description: Marksmen execute enemies under 12% Health. Every time a Marksman executes, all Marksman gain 4% Attack Speed. Gain a Jhin and a Kindred.

TFT14_Augment_Strong_Vertical.name: Lethal Rerouting
TFT14_Augment_Strong_Vertical.description: Slayers above 50% Health gain 20% Attack Damage. While under 50%, they gain 15% Omnivamp. Gain a Vayne and a Shaco.

TFT14_Augment_Supercharge_Splash.name: Transference
TFT14_Augment_Supercharge_Splash.description: When A.M.P. champions die, the nearest A.M.P. champion gains 1 Amp until the end of combat. Gain a Naafiri and a Nidalee.

TFT14_Augment_Supercharge_Vertical.name: Overclocked
TFT14_Augment_Supercharge_Vertical.description: Your A.M.P. champions with 3 items gain 1 Amp. Gain 4 rerolls, a Naafiri, and a Nidalee.

TFT14_Augment_Techie_Vertical.name: Cognitive Implant
TFT14_Augment_Techie_Vertical.description: Your Techies gain 5 Ability Power, increased by 1 for every 2 takedowns. Gain a Veigar and a Zyra.

TFT14_Augment_Suits_CorporateCashOut.name: Hostile Takeover
TFT14_Augment_Suits_CorporateCashOut.description: Cypher gains 75% of its combat bonus now. Gain 200% Intel from kills, but only 30% from losses. Gain a Draven.

TFT14_Augment_Suits_Liquidate.name: Liquidate
TFT14_Augment_Suits_Liquidate.description: When you trade Cypher Intel, your board and bench is sold for 300% value and you gain 4 Reforgers. Gain a Draven.

TFT14_Augment_Cyberboss_Cower.name: Cower, Weaklings!
TFT14_Augment_Cyberboss_Cower.description: Cyberboss abilities reduce the target's max Health by 20%. Cyberbosses take 20% less damage from enemies with less max Health. Gain a Poppy and a Veigar.

TFT14_Augment_Syndicate_KeepYourFriendsC.name: Keep Your Friends Close
TFT14_Augment_Syndicate_KeepYourFriendsC.description: Syndicate Kingpins gain 10% Attack Speed and 120 Health for each adjacent ally in their row. The allies gain 175 Health. Gain a Twisted Fate and a Darius.

TFT14_Augment_Immortal_VerticalPlus.name: Golden Fleece+
TFT14_Augment_Immortal_VerticalPlus.description: Each Golden Ox drops 1 gold after fighting 2 rounds. Your max interest is 7. Gain a Graves, an Alistar, and 4 gold.

TFT14_Augment_Boombots_BigBoom.name: Hunter Killer Missile
TFT14_Augment_Boombots_BigBoom.description: Every 6 Boombot rockets, fire an HK Missile at the current target that deals 350% of the original rocket's damage. Gain a Kog'Maw and a Skarner.

TFT14_Augment_Nitro_SpareParts.name: Spare Parts
TFT14_Augment_Nitro_SpareParts.description: Get a Nitro Hex Turret that has 33% of your total Chrome. Gain a Shyvana.

TFT14_Augment_Cyberboss_HighScore.name: New High Score
TFT14_Augment_Cyberboss_HighScore.description: Cyberbosses increase their score when they deal damage. When they reach the next high score, they gain 1.5% Attack Speed and bonus loot. Gain a Veigar and a Poppy.

TFT14_Augment_Nitro_PolishedChrome.name: Polished Chrome
TFT14_Augment_Nitro_PolishedChrome.description: When you 3-star Nitro champions, they gain 15% Attack Damage, 20 Ability Power, and grant 10 Gold. Gain a Kindred and a Nidalee.

TFT14_Augment_Divinicorp_Vertical.name: Divine Ascension
TFT14_Augment_Divinicorp_Vertical.description: After 12 seconds your Divinicorp champions ascend, gaining 20% Health and 30% Attack Speed. Gain a Rhaast and a Morgana.

TFT14_Augment_StreetDemon_Freestyling.name: Freestyling
TFT14_Augment_StreetDemon_Freestyling.description: Clear all painted hexes. When Street Demons start combat on a non-tagged hex, tag it. After all hexes are tagged, gain 25 gold. Gain 3 Street Demons.

TFT14_Augment_Divinicorp_Splash.name: Board of Directors
TFT14_Augment_Divinicorp_Splash.description: If you have 3 or fewer Divinicorp champions, their bonuses are increased by 75% + 10% for each Stage. Gain a Rhaast and a Morgana.

TFT14_Augment_Techie_Splash.name: Capacitor
TFT14_Augment_Techie_Splash.description: When Techies cast, grant the lowest Health Techie a Shield equal to 200% of the Mana spent. Gain a Veigar and a Zyra.

TFT14_Augment_StreetDemon_TaggingSpree.name: Tagging Spree
TFT14_Augment_StreetDemon_TaggingSpree.description: Signature Street Demon hexes grant 5% Attack Speed. Gain 3 Street Demons and 2 Spray Can items that create signature Street Demon hexes.

TFT14_Augment_Thirsty_Vertical.name: Memory Bank
TFT14_Augment_Thirsty_Vertical.description: Gain a Jhin and Morgana. Dynamos gain 4% Damage Amp. After they spend 7000 Mana, gain a Zhonya's Paradox and an Aurora.

TFT14_Augment_Swift_Vertical.name: Speed Kills
TFT14_Augment_Swift_Vertical.description: Rapidfire champions start at 2 stacks and can go to 15. If you win combat within 18 seconds, gain 2 gold. Gain a Twisted Fate and a Kog'Maw.

TFT14_Augment_PoppyCarry.name: Button Mash
TFT14_Augment_PoppyCarry.description: Gain a Poppy. Your strongest Poppy's ability is replaced with a 3-hit Wallop.

TFT14_Augment_Exotech_TrialRun.name: Trial Run
TFT14_Augment_Exotech_TrialRun.description: Gain an Exotech Golem with a copy of each of your Exotech items. It gains 1.5% Health and 4% Attack Damage per Exotech star level. Gain a Jhin and a Naafiri.

TFT14_Augment_RhaastCarry.name: Alter Ego
TFT14_Augment_RhaastCarry.description: Gain a Rhaast. Your strongest Rhaast enters Shadow Assassin form and his ability is replaced with a dash and 1 hex spin. If it kills, he immediately casts again.

TFT14_Augment_SylasCarry.name: Wolf Unchained
TFT14_Augment_SylasCarry.description: Gain a Sylas. Your strongest Sylas's ability deals more damage and recasts on kill, but his Health gain no longer scales with Ability Power.

TFT14_Augment_Syndicate_DummyWithAGun.name: Dummy With A Gun
TFT14_Augment_Syndicate_DummyWithAGun.description: With Syndicate active, your Training Dummies shoot enemies. Every 2 times they attack, grant the Kingpins 2% Attack Damage and Ability Power. Gain 1 Training Dummy, a Darius, and a Twisted Fate.

TFT14_Augment_AnimaSquad_SupportSpire.name: Support Spire
TFT14_Augment_AnimaSquad_SupportSpire.description: After 10 seconds in combat, a support spire grants Anima Squad a Shield, Attack Speed, or Stuns all enemies. Gain 3 Anima Squad champions.

TFT14_Augment_GragasCarry.name: The Chug Bug
TFT14_Augment_GragasCarry.description: Gain 1 Gragas. Your strongest Gragas's attacks have a chance to knockback and deal bonus magic damage. His ability heals and empowers his next attack.

TFT14_Augment_GragasCarryPlus.name: The Chug Bug+
TFT14_Augment_GragasCarryPlus.description: Gain 2 Gragas. Your strongest Gragas's attacks have a chance to knockback and deal bonus magic damage. His ability heals and empowers his next attack.

TFT14_Augment_Exotech_Cyberdeck.name: Cyberdeck
TFT14_Augment_Exotech_Cyberdeck.description: On combat start, up to 3 of your Exotech units with 2 items gain an ideal Exotech item. Gain a Jax and Naafiri.

TFT14_Augment_Guardian_Vertical.name: Reactive Shell
TFT14_Augment_Guardian_Vertical.description: Vanguards gain 8% Health. When the Vanguard Shield ends, deal 50% of the initial Shield as magic damage to their current target. Gain a Skarner and a Vi.

TFT14_Augment_JaxCarry.name: Adaptive Strikes
TFT14_Augment_JaxCarry.description: Gain a Jax. Your strongest Jax's attacks deal bonus magic damage every 3rd attack which gets stronger each time. His ability grants Attack Speed.

TFT14_Augment_ViCarry.name: Cease and Desist
TFT14_Augment_ViCarry.description: Gain a Vi. Your strongest Vi gains Attack Speed and her ability dashes to the farthest target within 3-hexes, Stuns, and deals bonus physical damage.

TFT14_Augment_AnimaSquadCrown.name: Anima Squad Crown
TFT14_Augment_AnimaSquadCrown.description: Gain an Anima Squad Emblem, an Adaptive Helm, and an Illaoi.

TFT14_Augment_BoomBotsCrown.name: BoomBot Crown
TFT14_Augment_BoomBotsCrown.description: Gain a BoomBot Emblem, an Ionic Spark, and a Skarner.

TFT14_Augment_DivinicorpCrown.name: Divinicorp Crown
TFT14_Augment_DivinicorpCrown.description: Gain a Divinicorp Emblem, a Redemption, and a Rhaast.

TFT14_Augment_ExotechCrown.name: Exotech Crown
TFT14_Augment_ExotechCrown.description: Gain an Exotech Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, and a Naafiri.

TFT14_Augment_GoldenOxCrown.name: Golden Ox Crown

TFT14_Augment_RapidfireCrown.description: Gain a Rapidfire Emblem, a Giant Slayer, and a Twisted Fate.

TFT14_Augment_SlayerCrown.name: Slayer Crown
TFT14_Augment_SlayerCrown.description: Gain a Slayer Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Vayne.

TFT14_Augment_TechieCrown.name: Techie Crown
TFT14_Augment_TechieCrown.description: Gain a Techie Emblem, a Jeweled Gauntlet, and a Shyvana.

TFT14_Augment_StrategistCrown.name: Strategist Crown
TFT14_Augment_StrategistCrown.description: Gain a Strategist Emblem, an Adaptive Helm, and an Ekko.

TFT14_Augment_VanguardCrown.name: Vanguard Crown
TFT14_Augment_VanguardCrown.description: Gain a Vanguard Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Skarner.

TFT14_Augment_AnimaSquadCirclet.description: Gain an Anima Squad Emblem and a Yuumi.

TFT14_Augment_BoomBotsCirclet.name: BoomBot Circlet
TFT14_Augment_BoomBotsCirclet.description: Gain a BoomBot Emblem and a Fiddlesticks.

TFT14_Augment_BastionCirclet.name: Bastion Circlet
TFT14_Augment_BastionCirclet.description: Gain a Bastion Emblem and a Galio.

TFT14_Augment_BruiserCirclet.name: Bruiser Circlet
TFT14_Augment_BruiserCirclet.description: Gain a Bruiser Emblem and a Gragas.

TFT14_Augment_DivinicorpCirclet.name: Divinicorp Circlet
TFT14_Augment_DivinicorpCirclet.description: Gain a Divinicorp Emblem and a Senna.

TFT14_Augment_DynamoCirclet.name: Dynamo Circlet
TFT14_Augment_DynamoCirclet.description: Gain a Dynamo Emblem and an Elise.

TFT14_Augment_ExecutionerCirclet.name: Executioner Circlet
TFT14_Augment_ExecutionerCirclet.description: Gain an Executioner Emblem and a Rengar.

TFT14_Augment_ExotechCirclet.name: Exotech Circlet
TFT14_Augment_ExotechCirclet.description: Gain an Exotech Emblem and a Mordekaiser.

TFT14_Augment_GoldenOxCirclet.name: Golden Ox Circlet
TFT14_Augment_GoldenOxCirclet.description: Gain a Golden Ox Emblem and a Jarvan.

TFT14_Augment_MarksmanCirclet.description: Gain a Marskman Emblem and a Jinx.

TFT14_Augment_RapidfireCirclet.description: Gain a Rapidfire Emblem and a Draven.

TFT14_Augment_SlayerCirclet.description: Gain a Slayer Emblem and a Jarvan.

TFT14_Augment_StrategistCirclet.name: Strategist Circlet
TFT14_Augment_StrategistCirclet.description: Gain a Strategist Emblem and a Yuumi.

TFT14_Augment_StreetDemonCirclet.name: Street Demon Circlet
TFT14_Augment_StreetDemonCirclet.description: Gain a Street Demon Emblem and a Jinx.

TFT14_Augment_SyndicateCirclet.description: Gain a Syndicate Emblem and a Braum.

TFT14_Augment_TechieCirclet.description: Gain a Techie Emblem and a Mordekaiser.

TFT14_Augment_VanguardCirclet.name: Vanguard Circlet
TFT14_Augment_VanguardCirclet.description: Gain a Vanguard Emblem and a Braum.

TFT14_Augment_AnimaSquad_PowerUp.name: Power Leveling
TFT14_Augment_AnimaSquad_PowerUp.description: Anima Squad takedowns have a 30% chance to drop an XP orb that sells for 1 XP. Anima Squad units gain 1% Attack Speed for each of your player levels. Gain a Seraphine and Illaoi.

TFT7_Augment_ThinkFast.name: Think Fast
TFT7_Augment_ThinkFast.description: Shop rerolls are free until the end of this round. Traits and other augments do not benefit from these free Shops. Gain 3 gold.

TFT7_Augment_CursedCrown.name: Cursed Crown
TFT7_Augment_CursedCrown.description: Gain +2 max team size, but take 100% more player damage when you lose a player combat.

TFT6_Augment_BinaryAirdrop.name: Binary Airdrop
TFT6_Augment_BinaryAirdrop.description: Combat start:  Up to 4 champions holding 2 items gain a recommended 3rd completed item.

TFT9_Augment_FinalReserves.name: Final Reserves
TFT9_Augment_FinalReserves.description: The first time you would be eliminated, you instead remain alive. After this happens, gain 70 XP and set your gold to 90. Excess gold is converted to XP.

TFT6_Augment_WoodlandCharm.name: Woodland Charm
TFT6_Augment_WoodlandCharm.description: Your highest Health champion is cloned. The clone has 25% bonus Health and 30% bonus Attack Speed but cannot equip items.

TFT9_Augment_OneHundredDuckSizedHorses.name: Endless Hordes
TFT9_Augment_OneHundredDuckSizedHorses.description: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 20%. Gain 8 gold.

TFT9_Augment_OneHundredDuckSizedHorsesPl.name: Endless Hordes +
TFT9_Augment_OneHundredDuckSizedHorsesPl.description: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 20%. Gain 18 gold.

TFT14_Augment_BlackMarket_ScopedWeapons.name: Scoped Weapons II
TFT14_Augment_BlackMarket_ScopedWeapons.description: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain infinite Attack Range and 18% Attack Speed.

TFT7_Augment_SacrificialPact.name: Cruel Pact
TFT7_Augment_SacrificialPact.description: Buying XP costs 6 player health instead of 4 gold. Heal 3 player health before each player combat.

TFT6_Augment_LudensEcho3.name: Luden's Echo III
TFT6_Augment_LudensEcho3.description: Every 60 Mana spent, your units next instance of Ability damage deals an additional 100-250 (based on current Stage) magic damage to the target and a nearby enemy.

TFT6_Augment_HighEndShopping.name: High End Shopping II
TFT6_Augment_HighEndShopping.description: Champions appear in your Shop as if you were 1 level higher. Gain 6 gold.

TFT6_Augment_Twins3.name: Double Trouble III
TFT6_Augment_Twins3.description: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 35% Attack Damage and 35 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

TFT6_Augment_ThriftShop.name: Wise Spending
TFT6_Augment_ThriftShop.description: When you reroll your Shop, gain 2 XP. Gain 1 gold.

TFT_Augment_FutureSight2.name: Future Sight II
TFT_Augment_FutureSight2.description: You can see who you will fight next. Gain 2 Training Dummies, each equipped with a Zephyr or Shroud of Stillness.

TFT_Augment_ChemtechOverdrive.name: Chemtech Overdrive
TFT_Augment_ChemtechOverdrive.description: Open 3 portals to Zaun on random hexes in the second row. Any unit that starts combat in a portal gains 250 Health and 30% Attack Speed, and drops 1 gold on death.

TFT_Augment_Dominance3.name: Dominance
TFT_Augment_Dominance3.description: For every 2 surviving champions after winning a player combat, gain 1 gold. Gain 16 XP.

TFT_Augment_Pirates3.name: Pirates
TFT_Augment_Pirates3.description: Your units have a rare chance to drop treasure chests when they kill enemy champions.

TFT_Augment_ShareTheSpotlight.name: Share the Spotlight
TFT_Augment_ShareTheSpotlight.description: Gain a spotlight in the back corner of your board. All units in the spotlight gain 14% Damage Amp, 12% Omnivamp, and 2 Mana per second.

TFT14_Augment_BlackMarketBlueBattery.name: Blue Battery III
TFT14_Augment_BlackMarketBlueBattery.description: Gain a Blue Buff. Your units gain 15 Ability Power. After casting their Ability, gain 5 Mana.

TFT_Augment_AxiomArc3.name: Axiom Arc III
TFT_Augment_AxiomArc3.description: Your units gain 15 Mana on kill. Gain a completed item Anvil.

TFT14_Augment_BlackMarketUnstableEvoluti.name: Unstable Evolution
TFT14_Augment_BlackMarketUnstableEvoluti.description: Your champions randomly gain one of the following when they are starred up: 33 Health, 33% Attack Speed, 33% Attack Damage, or 33 Ability Power.

TFT14_Augment_BlackMarketGargantuanResol.name: Gargantuan Resolve
TFT14_Augment_BlackMarketGargantuanResol.description: Gain a Titan's Resolve and another after 2 player combats. Your Titan's Resolves can continue stacking to 50 instead of 25. The total resist bonus is increased by 50%.

TFT14_Augment_BlackMarketGargantuanResol.name: Gargantuan Resolve
TFT14_Augment_BlackMarketGargantuanResol.description: Gain a Titan's Resolve and another after 1 player combats. Your Titan's Resolves can continue stacking to 50 instead of 25. The total resist bonus is increased by 50%.

TFT14_Augment_BlackMarketTitanicStrength.name: Titanic Strength
TFT14_Augment_BlackMarketTitanicStrength.description: Your team gains 1.25% of their max Health as Attack Damage and 1.25% of their max Health as Ability Power.

TFT14_Augment_BlackMarketShockTreatment.name: Shock Treatment
TFT14_Augment_BlackMarketShockTreatment.description: Gain a Statikk Shiv and another after 5 player combats. Your Statikk Shivs grant 10% more Attack Speed and their chain lightning effects deal 30-120% more damage (based on stage level).

TFT14_Augment_BlackMarketShockTreatmentP.name: Shock Treatment+
TFT14_Augment_BlackMarketShockTreatmentP.description: Gain a Statikk Shiv and another after 3 player combats. Your Statikk Shivs grant 10% more Attack Speed and their chain lightning effects deal 40-125% more damage (based on stage level).

TFT14_Augment_LifeLongLearningBlackMarke.name: Lifelong Learning
TFT14_Augment_LifeLongLearningBlackMarke.description: Your units gain 1.5% health every round. If they survive combat, they gain an additional 2.5 Ability Power and 2.5% Attack Damage.
